snippet: Vladimir Kramnik has won the Sparkassen Chess Meeting 10 times, but he fell well behind this year.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that Fabiano Caruana takes early lead at the Sparkassen Chess Meeting, winning three of his first four games; observes that Vladimir Kramnik of Russia, who has won title 10 times, is off to rocky start.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir Kramnik has won the Sparkassen Chess Meeting 10 times, but he fell well behind this year.

headline.print_headline: Champion’s Luck Runs Out at His Favorite Tournament
headline.main: Champion’s Luck Runs Out at His Favorite Tournament
